title: Red Gerard on growing up, snowboarding, and Beijing 2022
description: Red Gerard blasted onto the snowboarding scene as 17-year-old at PyeongChang 2018 when he won gold in slopestyle. Four years later, he's matured into one of the leading names in the USA team. He spoke to Ashlee Tulloch about the incident with his missing jacket, maturing on the circuit, and snowboarding culture.
